```{r}
source_file <- tempfile()
test_file <- tempfile()

cat(file = source_file,
'
curry <- function(x)
{
  if(is.data.frame(x))
    return(1)
  else
    # test
    return(0)
}
')

cat(file = test_file,
'curry("a")')

cov <- file_coverage(source_file, test_file)
# report(cov)
as.data.frame(cov)
file.remove(source_file, test_file)
```

```{r}
source_file <- tempfile()
test_file <- tempfile()

cat(file = source_file,
'
curry <- function(x)
{
  if(is.data.frame(x)){
    # test0
    return(1)
  }  else if (is.character(x)){
    # test
    return(0)

  } else if (is.numeric(x)){
    # test1
    return(2)

  } else{
    return(3)

  }
}
')

cat(file = test_file,
'curry("a")')

cov <- file_coverage(source_file, test_file)
# report(cov)
as.data.frame(cov)
file.remove(source_file, test_file)
```
